translated: “Please accept me without regard for wealth and honor.

original: ces 'dod de nyid thob ma thag_/rdo rje'i rgyud shes da lta nga shes slob dpon
analyzed: ces 'dod de nyid thob ma thag_/rdo rje'i rgyud shes da lta nga shes slob dpon
translated: As soon as I attain the state of union, I will know the vajra tantras, just as you do now.”🔽The master first speaks:

original: gyis yang thog mar smra/_/mchog gi mi dmod chang dang bud med nor la rab
analyzed: gyis yang thog mar smra/_/mchog gi mi dmod chang dang bud med nor la rab
translated: “The supreme human does not disparage alcohol, women, or wealth.

original: chags bla ma la/_/mnyam zhes 'gran byed mi la dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa'ang
analyzed: chags bla ma la/_/mnyam zhes 'gran byed mi la dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa'ang
translated: The great glorious Vajrasattva is called fearful🔽by those who compete with their guru and say, He is my equal.

original: 'jigs zhes gsungs/_/de 'dra dpa' chen rang gi bu/_/de yi chung ma skal
analyzed: 'jigs zhes gsungs/_/de 'dra dpa' chen rang gi bu/_/de yi chung ma skal
translated: If the wife of such a great hero🔽is fortunate,

original: ldan na/_/khyim gcig tu yang mna' ma la/_/smra yi de la 'bad nas gsang /_/
analyzed: ldan na/_/khyim gcig tu yang mna' ma la/_/smra yi de la 'bad nas gsang /_/
translated: she will be able to speak to her co-wife in the same house,🔽but she should do so carefully and with effort.🔽If a fortunate disciple has great respect for the guru

original: skal bzang bla ma rab gus shing /_/zab mo'i chos dang sdom la gnas/_/de ni
analyzed: skal bzang bla ma rab gus shing /_/zab mo'i chos dang sdom la gnas/_/de ni
translated: and abides in the profound Dharma and vows,🔽then even if he is in the midst of a crowd,

original: tshhong 'dus dbus gnas na/_/shub bur yang ni de nyid bshad/_/gzhan gyi
analyzed: tshhong 'dus dbus gnas na/_/shub bur yang ni de nyid bshad/_/gzhan gyi
translated: speak to him in a low voice.🔽If he is under the control of others,

original: dbang byed la bdag po/_/yul gzhan song na de nyid sbyin/_/ngan pa de la
analyzed: dbang byed la bdag po/_/yul gzhan song na de nyid sbyin/_/ngan pa de la
translated: give him the instructions when he is in a different place.🔽Do not even mention the name of that bad person, my friends!

original: ming tsham yang /_/brjod par mi bya grogs dag kye/_/mi srun rjes su bzung na
analyzed: ming tsham yang /_/brjod par mi bya grogs dag kye/_/mi srun rjes su bzung na
translated: If you take care of the unruly,🔽both will be ruined.

original: gnyis ka ltung /_/blo bzang thams cad bde ba'i 'bras ldan pas/_/'dis ni
analyzed: gnyis ka ltung /_/blo bzang thams cad bde ba'i 'bras ldan pas/_/'dis ni
translated: Since the good-natured have a result that is happiness,

original: rnal 'byor brtshon par bsgrubs pa la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan du don
analyzed: rnal 'byor brtshon par bsgrubs pa la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan du don
translated: they accomplish the colorful yoga.

original: bcas yin/_/dges pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag gsal ba a sitag+han zhes bya ba dang po log pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i spyod pa pa byad la'i gdam pas 'dod pa'i dngos
analyzed: bcas yin/_/dges pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag gsal ba a sitag+han zhes bya ba dang po log pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i spyod pa pa byad la'i gdam pas 'dod pa'i dngos
translated: The instructions of Hevajra called Clarifying the Meaning of the Root and Commentary Tantra, the first of which is the conduct of one who has entered the wrong path, the selection of the🔽

original: grub brnyes pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/_/🔽yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud du 'khrungs pa/_pan grub kyi bla ma dam pa mang po'i🔽zhal lung gis thugs sim pa las rdo rje 'chang gis gnas brnyes pa/_rje btshun
analyzed: grub brnyes pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/_/ yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud du 'khrungs pa/_pan grub kyi bla ma dam pa mang po'i zhal lung gis thugs sim pa las rdo rje 'chang gis gnas brnyes pa/_rje btshun
translated: The instructions of Hevajra called Clarifying the Meaning, composed by the master Aśīta, who attained the desired accomplishments through the practice of the Bhairava Tantra, which is the first of the path of perversion.

original: bud+ha gup+ta na tha'i zhal las byung ba ltar/_dges pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag ku sa las
analyzed: bud+ha gup+ta na tha'i zhal las byung ba ltar/_dges pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag ku sa las
translated: The instructions of Hevajra called Kusala, composed by the master Buddhaguhya, who was born in the southern region and whose mind was satisfied by the oral instructions of many holy gurus, who attained the stage of Vajradhara, and who arose from the mouth of the lord Buddhaguhya.

original: mdzad pa dang /_sgron me gcig pa dang /_rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa rnams🔽kyang kun dga' snying pos g.yar khral du sgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: mdzad pa dang /_sgron me gcig pa dang /_rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa rnams🔽kyang kun dga' snying pos g.yar khral du sgyur ba'o//_//
translated: The Single Lamp and the Six-Branched Yoga were also translated by Ānandagarbha as a loan.
